submission:
class Solution(object):
    def minimumCost(self, m, n, horizontalCut, verticalCut):
        """
        :type m: int
        :type n: int
        :type horizontalCut: List[int]
        :type verticalCut: List[int]
        :rtype: int
        """
        h, v = 1, 1
        horizontalCut = sorted(horizontalCut, reverse=True)
        verticalCut = sorted(verticalCut, reverse=True)
        
        i, j = 0, 0
        res = 0
        while i < len(horizontalCut) and j < len(verticalCut):
            if horizontalCut[i] > verticalCut[j]:
                res += horizontalCut[i] * h
                i += 1
                v += 1
            else:
                res += verticalCut[j] * v
                j += 1
                h += 1
        
        while i < len(horizontalCut):
            res += horizontalCut[i] * h
            i += 1

        while j < len(verticalCut):
            res += verticalCut[j] * v
            j += 1
        return res
